Welcome to my home page.
I am a statistician, currently working as a postdoctoral researcher at University of Oulu, jointly in [Research Unit of Mathematical Sciences](https://www.oulu.fi/mathematics/) and [Center for Life Course Health Research](https://www.oulu.fi/medicine/elite).
